title: FS: A few forties (and a thirty) - PRICES REDUCED 5/4

posts.post_title: FS: A few forties (and a thirty) - PRICES REDUCED 5/4
posts.post_content:
All are SGC 40, except for the Lumley which is an SGC 30.

Prices include delivery; paypal preferred; back scans available upon request

Howie Camnitz (Arms Folded):SC350-30 - $38
Patsy Dougherty (Portrait):SC150-30 - SOLD
Jimmy Dygert:SC350-30 - $38
Lefty Leifield (Batting):SC350-30 - $42
Harry Lumley:SC150-30 - SOLD
Rebel Oakes:SC350-30 - $38
George Perring:P350 - $43
Germany Schaefer (Washington):P460-25 - $45
Fred Snodgrass (Catching):SC350-30 - SOLD
I'll take the Snodgrass, PM sent
